title: Build a Card Component
description:
Create a styled card component using the CSS box model.

## Requirements

1. Style the `.card` container:
   - Width of 320px
   - White background
   - 20px padding on all sides
   - 1px solid #ddd border
   - 8px border-radius
   - Use border-box sizing

2. Style the `.card-title` (h3):
   - No top margin
   - 12px bottom margin
   - #333 text color

3. Style the `.card-text` (p):
   - No margins
   - #666 text color
   - 1.5 line height

## Expected Result

A clean card with proper internal spacing and consistent styling.

testCases.description: Card title should have no top margin
Card title should have 12px bottom margin
